ComicInfo.Summary: Emily is entering her first year of college and looking to reinvent herself after the loss of her best friend. But when she discovers the terrible history of her dormitory, she channels her guilt into a new obsession: discovering the truth about the Lion, a serial killer that stalked her college campus for nearly a decade. But old ghosts can lay dormant for only so long...
